T02D3269:23a-4: stong pa nyid bsgoms pa'i rjes thogs la nyi ma
T02D3269:23b-0: la dzam ser po @23b las byung ba'i dzambha la
T02D3269:23b-1: ser po zhal gsum phyag drug pa /
T02D3269:23b-2: mi bskyod pa dang ral pa dang cod pan dang ldan pa ste /
T02D3269:23b-3: g-yas pa'i phyag gsum gyis ni shing thog ma du lu ngga dang /
T02D3269:23b-4: lcags kyu dang mda' bsnams ba'o //
T02D3269:23b-5: g-yon pa'i phyag dang po gcig gis ni g-yon zur na gnas pa'i shes rab la 'khyud pa /
T02D3269:23b-6: g-yon pa'i phyag gzhan gnyis kyis ni zhags pa dang bcas pa'i ne'u le dang /
T02D3269:23b-7: gzhu bsnams par bdag nyid nges par rdzogs par byas la /
T02D3269:23b-8: mdun du yang gzugs de bsam gtan gyis bzhugs su gsol zhing /
T02D3269:23b-9: de'i mgo la yang rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po bsgoms te /
T02D3269:23b-10: de zhu bas dbang bskur bar gyur ba dang //
T02D3269:23b-11: rdo rje'i chu lan brgya rtsa brgyad khyor bas blugs par bya ba'o //
T02D3269:23b-12: 'di ni man ngag gi khyad par gzhan gyis dzambha la'i sgrub thabs yin te /
T02D3269:23b-14: aom dzambha la dza lendra ye sv'a h'a /
